content: slip under a field of daisies with this delightful crochet blanket brought to life in rich shades of red heart super saver you ll do single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet slip_stitch and more constructed by creating motifs and then assembling them together this is a great project to take with you on the go explore super saver s huge range of colors and invent a throw that suits your decor materials red heart® super saver™ 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a carrot 0256 2 balls or 545 yds/498 5 m contrast b gold 0321 2 balls or 545 yds/498 5 m contrast c paddy green 0368 2 balls or 545 yds/498 5 m contrast d pale plum 0579 2 balls or 665 yds/608 m contrast e soft white 0316 2 balls or 620 yds/567 m contrast f light raspberry 0774 2 balls or 545 yds/498 5 m gauges 12 single_crochet and 15 row = 4 10 cm motif = 5½ 14 cm square measurements approx 57 x 68 145 x 173 cm
